review_text: Amazing earbuds with great ANC. Battery life is outstanding and the case is compact. Highly recommended for the price.
Sound quality is good but the fit could be better for smaller ears. Overall a decent purchase.
Incredible value for money. The ANC works really well and call quality is excellent.
It's okay for the price. Nothing special but gets the job done.
Battery drains faster than advertised. Expected better from OnePlus.
